title.narrative: Training And Capacity Development In Support To The Land Policy Initiative In Africa

description.narrative: The project aims at contributing to the implementation of the Framework and Guidelines on LandPolicy in Africa by strengthening the capacity of the key upstream change agents - including Africangovernments, civil society, private sector, African universities, research institutes, centres ofexcellence, leading consultancy firms, Regional Economic Commissions, African Union Commissionand African Development Bank, traditional leaders, land practitioners, etc - to promote and implementsecure land rights for all for sustainable urban development, poverty reduction, enhanced productivityand economic growth in Africa.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Economic Commission for Africa

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

title.narrative: Key selected African land stakeholders13 have improved capacity to implement programmes that secure land rights for all.

description.narrative: Key selected African land stakeholders13 have improved capacity to implement programmes that secure land rights for all.

comment.narrative: More than 20% at project completion; More than 40% two years after project completion.
